name: Catholic Migrant Farmworker Network (CMFN)
category: Catholic-owned Seasonal farm labor in Arizona
description: This organization advocates for social justice, dignity, and respect for farmworkers, providing spiritual and educational opportunities. They also run programs like "El Sembrador" to equip communities to support farmworkers

category: Catholic-owned Seasonal farm labor in Arizona

category: Catholic-owned Seasonal farm labor in Arizona
